inputs.remark:
Ordered list: DPOAEs missing.
V2: LiSNâ€‘S not completed.
Expected outcome: Add Total Advantage = Talker Advantage + Spatial Advantage.
Timeline: Expected outcome content should belong to V3.

logic_summary: Added DPOAEs to the ordered list of investigations as per the text.
Updated V2 LiSN-S result summary to include Talker, Spatial, and Total Advantage values from Table 1.1.
Created V3 in expected_interpretations_by_visit to house the follow-up results previously in expected_outcome.
Populated V3 with tests and subjective reports, including the Total Advantage field in LiSN-S as requested (using Table 1.2 value).
Removed the now redundant expected_outcome field.

value.rationale_short: To assess cochlear outer hair cell function.

patch_ops.value: Deficits in spatial and talker cues; Low-cue SRT 14.6 dB, High-cue SRT 14.2 dB, Talker Advantage: -0.4 dB, Spatial Advantage: -0.2 dB, Total Advantage: 0.5 dB.

value.collective_interpretation: Patient reported significantly reduced anxiety and avoidance behaviors in social situations. Patient found the FM system and Brain Fitness Program helpful and reported significant improvements in daily quality of life.

tests.name: Words-in-Noise (WIN) test
tests.result_summary: 15.6 dB SNR (severe SNR loss), showing improvement from baseline but remaining abnormal.

tests.name: Adaptive Test of Temporal Resolution (ATTR)
tests.result_summary: Gap detection threshold 15.5 msec, significantly improved from baseline but still abnormal.

tests.name: Listening in Spatialized Noise (LiSN-S)
tests.result_summary: Low-cue SRT 10.6 dB, High-cue SRT 8.2 dB, Talker Advantage 1.4 dB, Spatial Advantage 5.6 dB, Total Advantage: 4.5 dB; improved scores but still below normal limits.
